item.title: Getting Rid of ._ and .DS_Store Files
item.description: When you transfer files and folders from Macs to PCs and USB sticks a whole bunch of ._ files and .DS_Store files are generated. While there is no way to prevent this from happening, there is an easy way to get rid of these pesky files. This post shows you how.
